label: 散茶
本: Yoshiwara: The Glittering World of the Japanese Courtesan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1993
説明文: A rank for courtesans created in the last quarter of the seventeenth century when illegal prostitutes from the teahouses were arrested and sent to the Yoshiwara. They were placed between kōshi and tsubone. The rank was changed into chusan in the mid-eighteenth century. [吉原、格子、局、昼三]
